li.label: unaffected
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} just doesn't give a shit what others think. {PAWN_pronoun} is unaffected by slights and insults, but also by kind words.

li.label: delightful
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is charming and charismatic. Others are inclined to like {PAWN_objective}, and {PAWN_possessive} knows how to lift their spirits with well-placed words.
